TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemStyle Inherits Style
public ref class MenuItemStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控件中菜单项的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a menu item in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来表示中的菜单项的样式控件。Use the class to represent the style of a menu item in the control. 在静态菜单或动态菜单中显示的菜单项。A menu item is displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 静态菜单始终显示在控制，而仅当用户将鼠标指针定位在父菜单项包含动态子菜单时，将显示一个动态菜单。A static menu is always displayed in a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 可以为每个不同的菜单项类型指定不同的样式特征 （如字体大小和颜色）。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different menu item types. 下表列出了可用的菜单项样式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前所选动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前所选的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 当多个样式属性设置静态菜单项时，按以下顺序应用的样式属性：When multiple style properties are set for a static menu item, the style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 同样，按以下顺序应用动态菜单项的样式属性：Likewise, the style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义的集合，就会应用在此期间，重写其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 类继承其大多数成员从类。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它扩展类通过提供控制的菜单项的文本周围的空间，以及相邻菜单项之间的空间量的属性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text, as well as the space between adjacent menu items. 使用属性来控制量空间左侧和右侧的菜单项的文本。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同样，属性控制菜单项的文本和下方的更高版本的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 你可以控制之间的间距量的菜单项对象将应用于和其相邻菜单项，通过设置属性。You can control the amount of spacing between the menu item that the object is applied to and its adjacent menu items by setting the property. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何控制中的菜单项的外观通过设置的样式属性的控件从返回的对象， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the menu items in a control by setting the style properties of the object returned from the , , , and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/CS/menuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/VB/menuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性复制到 类的当前实例中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性复制对象中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 中的当前实例的所有属性类将被替换的相应属性中指定为对象。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要将样式属性复制而无需替换任何设置的值，请使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将复制的样式设置的另一个对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style settings of another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/CS/menuitemstylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/VB/menuitemstylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单项文本左侧和右侧的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text.

value.span: 菜单项文本左侧和右侧的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) to the left and right of the menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制菜单项的文本周围的水平间隔量对象应用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 文本的左边的缘之间的边框的文本区域中，和文本的右边缘和文本的边框之间插入此空格。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, and between the right edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制的垂直间距，使用属性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来填充菜单项文本周围的水平间距 10 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the horizontal spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/CS/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/VB/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ItemSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.ItemSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用了 对象的菜单项与其相邻菜单项之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.

value.span: 应用了 对象的菜单项与其相邻菜单项之间的垂直间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of vertical spacing (in pixels) between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制的菜单项之间的垂直间距量应用对象和其相邻的菜单项，在同一级别上。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items at the same level. 当前菜单项的上边缘和上一菜单项，以及当前菜单项的下边缘和下一步的菜单项的上边缘之间的下边缘之间插入此空格。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current menu item and the lower edge of the previous menu item, as well as between the lower edge of the current menu item and upper edge of the next menu item. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一个菜单项，不呈现上部空间控件。The upper space is not rendered for the first menu item in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性用于将菜单项与其相邻菜单项与隔离 5 个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to separate a menu item from its adjacent menu items by 5 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/CS/menuitemstyleitemspacingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/VB/menuitemstyleitemspacingvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The to combine settings with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性与 类的当前实例的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性组合在一起对象的样式属性从中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法通过设置每个属性的未设置在当前加入的样式属性对象中指定其相应的值与对象。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 将更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果在指定的属性对象未设置，在当前的相应属性对象不会更改。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来组合的当前实例的样式设置类与另一个对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style settings of the current instance of the class with another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/CS/menuitemstylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/VB/menuitemstylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来删除任何已定义的样式元素，从状态袋和重置到其原始状态的对象。Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以返回当前到其原始状态的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the current object to its original state. span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) above and below a menu item's text.
The default is 0.
